backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, affected frontend files, and confidence levels for two feature updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, features, and utilities.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variables for Razorpay and caricature API configuration with fallback behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind global styles defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation explaining features, tech stack, and structure of the React + Vite frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling global providers, screen navigation, and route guards.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper centering content with a max width for screens.
frontend/src/components/PhotoInput.tsx: Component enabling image upload or camera capture, managing preview, retake, and removal flows.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, language selector, theme toggle, and optional logout button.
frontend/src/config/env.ts: Environment loader reading Vite env vars and exposing helpers for checking Razorpay and API config.
Local authentication context managing users, sessions, login/signup, and logout using storage.
frontend/src/features/generation/generat: Type definitions for caricature generation input and result including photo data and timestamp.
frontend/src/features/generation/useCari: Handles caricature generation via API or placeholder, manages state, and stores results in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/i18n/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages and translation dictionaries for UI text.
frontend/src/features/i18n/useI18n.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language persistence and a translation helper.
frontend/src/features/payment/razorpayPl: Placeholder Razorpay initializer that logs warnings when not configured.
frontend/src/features/payment/useMockPay: Simulates payment processing with a delay and marks payment as complete in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/pricing/useRegiona: Fetches user region to determine price info and caches it locally.
frontend/src/features/theme/useTheme.tsx: Theme context managing light/dark mode with persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth flow, exposing identity, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme styles defining light and dark mode color variables and transitions.
frontend/src/lib/downloadPng.ts: Downloads images, converting SVGs to PNG using a canvas when needed.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Utility functions for safe JSON localStorage get, set, and remove operations.
frontend/src/lib/uiStyles.ts: Exports reusable Tailwind class strings for common UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting App within providers for React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Provides login and signup forms with local auth, Google link, and tabbed UI, showing toasts and navigating on success.
Handles photo upload, mock payment flow, and triggering caricature generation, including loading states and stored input recovery.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the landing hero, example images, tagline, and a CTA button that navigates to the next screen.
frontend/src/screens/ResultScreen.tsx: Shows the generated caricature, optional source photo, download functionality, and an option to start a new attempt.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current specification, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the CaricatureMe MVP.
